tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr.Madhumitha has amazing problem solving abilities. 
Natural human biases in decision making often cause us to shut down the range of solutions too early. But I found her to extremely curious to know the WHY , Why is this solution better? Why not that one? She patiently and actively gets into the depth of our complaints.  AN AMAZING GENIUS OF A LISTENER. Quick to question her own hypotheses and nrver shy away from embracing uncertainty. Its her curiosity that I feel keeps her apart. Quite grateful I discovered her existence in this large world.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Our case is complicated. Dont want to get into details. I got to know about  Madhu madam from a cousin  Then. We regularly visited her for weeks by now. Ah..She has a photographic memory and she remembers even trivial details we told her causually during initial days of treatment. She connects all those information and offers deep insights on treatment from what we felt as insignificant details that we had said to her. Things are working now in my life..Thanks maam. . Only small suggestion with all those smarts and jovial nature inside, you could smile a little more. ***** *******  ** ************ ****

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Typing this for a close relative who wish to remain anonymous.. \".was struggling with primary infertility over past 6 years and undergone 6 iui and 1 IVf in other state private hospital. Vexed with that, we shifted to Chennai and heard about Dr.madhu through close contact and since I once had already consulted Dr. Madhu for second opinion I was very hopeful about the doctor. And true to my expectations doctor thoroughly checked myself and my husband's condition and suggested ivf. Now I m confirmed 3 months pregnant and we are extremely happy. Doctor, nurses and staff are very helpful and clear all doubts whenever asked. IVF counselling was well explained. For me, the injection requirement went above normal range. However hospital was considerate and gave some relief on the overall cost.\

tags: None
review:
Dr Madhumitha is a very friendly doctor and go to person for all health related queries , I have consulted with her for all my menstrual cycle observations or issues  and child birth related queries. She always explains patiently and never hesitates to answer the same question repeatedly. She is highly knowledgeable and dedicated person as well. 
She always gives good hopes and make us feel positive about the health issues whatsoever.
She is also accessible over phone anytime for any quick assistance.
I would personally recommend the doctor for all your gynaecology and Obstetrics related consultations.

context: Infertility Evaluation / Treatment,Fertilisation In Vitro - Embryo Transfer (IVF - ET),Obstetrics Problems,
review: Visited hive clinic at nanganallur. They have very detailed set up. Facilities for scans etc were also available. Health maintained and friendly staff. Dr. Madhumitha especially is quite efficient and knowledgable. Madam quickly understand my history even from my superificial explanation of my symptoms . Thats when i understood i am in safe hands. I will never compromise other than her services. Completely happy.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Visited the hive clinic which is much close to nanganallur as i am in madipakkam. They have very good team-based care with a physician, physician assistant, nurses, and medical assistants all working together. Got totally impressed with the understanding dr.madhu showed for my troubles and emotions. She showed enormous empathy for my concerns and approached with utmost sensitivity . Totally recommend her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: General Medical Consultation,All Blood investigations for women\men\children,Obstetrics Problems,
review: As a doctor, you‚Äôre often expected to know all the answers and when you don‚Äôt, it may feel like you‚Äôre not good enough. However, having the self-awareness to admit when you don‚Äôt know something or when you‚Äôve made a mistake is a much better approach than moving forward unsure. Not only will this lead to better outcomes but it‚Äôll also help build trust in patients like us. I feel if i need to describe Dr.madhu in one quality it is this COMPLETE SELF AWARENESS

review: The clinic is  clean and well maintained. Found it to be easily identifiable between madipakkam and nanganallur. The doctor mrs.madhu too was polite and sharp . And has endless patience for the doubts i pose her. LolZ. Thanks for putring up with me and helping me doc.

Location wise too conveint located between madipakkam and nanganallur

review: They have all the necessary facilities in their set up. The cleanliness of the clinic is quite good. Dr.madhumitha has good memory and good professionalism in her approach. If a doctor can invest so much into patients sake i felt really humbled.

Definitely recommend her for her expertise and level headedness.

context: Infertility Evaluation / Treatment,Female Infertility Treatment,Infertility in Women,
review: I went to the Dr. Madhumitha with long prior history of medical issues. Reports from multiple doctors . She took a patient and STRUCTUREDapproach in analysing and combing through all my data . I found her absolutely comfortable with all the ambiguity and seeming complexity. She suggested a phased approach and articulated her assessment quite well in clear terms . I feel i am on the right path to recovery.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr.madhumitha is extremely sharp and has a photographic memory. She was strongly recommended by my friends circle and she did not disappoint. Quite quick in diagnosis and offers most organic of solutions and has amazing foresight on the journey to recovery. Her grasp on the practical realities that a body can handle is quite stunning for a person of her age. DOC YOU ROCK!!
